docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: As Elizabeth M. Cosper changed lenses on a microscope and focused it, she cautioned a visitor to the Marine Sciences Research Center here not to expect too much.

headline.main: L.I. SCIENTISTS DISCOVER ORIGINS OF 'BROWN TIDE'

docs.snippet: LEAD: As Elizabeth M. Cosper changed lenses on a microscope and focused it, she cautioned a visitor to the Marine Sciences Research Center here not to expect too much.

byline.original: By PHILIP S. GUTIS, Special to the New York Times
